Author: Fella_shibby
Review_Title: Date Night part two. Funny n entertaining with lovely performances by Issa Rae and Kumail Nanjiani.
Review:
An argumentative couple on the brink of ending their relationship, hits a cyclist with their car who doesn't get injured. Later they r approached by a cop who uses their car to pursue the same cyclist n rather than arresting the cyclist, the cop kills him with the couple's car. The couple flee the scene aft witnessing the murder. The husband wants them to turn themselves in, but the wife argues that their unbelievable story and racial profiling will ensure they are blamed for the crime. They try to pursue the matter n solve the mystery to clear their names.
Well this may seem very similar to Date Night but this film has enuff funny moments, good pacing n lovely chemistry n acting.
Coincidentally this is the second Kumail Nanjiani film aft Stuber I saw within a short period n both r very funny n light films to check out during this lockdown.

Author: kosmasp
Review: I understand if you watch this and don't like it. Tastes differ and that is more than ok. What I don't get is, calling this boring. You can call this a full range of things, but boring? Interesting choice to describe, but ultimately you'll lose my respect and your opinion may be void to me. The movie starts off like a romantic comedy and it really looked like it for some time. If it continued like that, I'd understand if you thought or felt this was boring. But it didn't ... it changes pace and goes places I didn't expect it to go.

Author: Neon_Gold
Review: This film is very hit or miss. At times it can be really funny. For example one of the first scenes of the leads as a couple in their apartment is great. I think it really gets how couples are and how they argue about trivial things and they make it really funny.

Author: deloudelouvain
Review_Title: Funny enough for me to keep me entertained.
Review: When I saw Kumail Nanjianis name in the cast I knew I would have a good time watching this comedy. I don't know if I can see him in anything else than a comedy and that's fine. He just has that kind of funny face. Stuber was the last movie I enjoyed from him and now it will be The Lovebirds. Don't expect anything too serious though, it's just a mild rom-com with a little crime investigation to spice it up, but there are enough funny moments to keep you entertained. The two main characters are played by Issa Rae and Kumail Nanjiani, and it works good. The Lovebirds isn't great cinema, but it doesn't pretend to be, it's just a good moment of easy comedy, a genre that we all need at some point.

Author: Eggoreluckadman
Review: I thought the trailer was kind of bad so I was pleasantly surprised by how funny the movie was. Gotta give credit to Kumail Nanjiani and Issa Rae. I was a fan of Kumail from Silicon Valley and The Big Sick, but I had yet to see anything Issa Rae is in. Now I really want to watch Insecure. The film is also self aware, it's only around 90 minutes so it doesn't waste any time. Overall, solid comedy but I'm glad I watched it on Netflix rather than in a theater.

Author: tilokaudaman
Review: The best thing about this film is the witty dialogue and the repore between the two leads. It reminded me a bit of the old Thin Man films. It's a pleasant escape from these dark times and offers some much needed laughter.

Author: agibson-97396
Review_Title: A 6??? The funniest movie I've seen in a LONG time
Review: What movie were the people who reviewed this watching? This movie is absolutely HILARIOUS. I usually only do reviews for horrible movies, but I haven't seen a movie this funny is a LONG time, so I felt a review was necessary. The chemistry between the main characters was unreal - like I felt like they were actually a couple in real life. Loved loved loved it.

Author: Jared_Andrews
Review_Title: Not Exactly Original, but still Fun
Review: Issa Rae and Kumail Nanjiani make for an instantly believable couple. The first moments of "The Lovebirds" establish that these two have obvious chemistry, they seem like a real couple (maybe even one that you know), and most importantly, they're undeniably likable. The entire success of the movie hinges upon the actors' ability to be charming and witty and enjoyable as a duo. If they do not play off each other in a fun and funny way, no viewer is going to want to hang out with them for 90 minutes.

Author: efd-10467
Review: A funny comedy, a very refreshing light hearted film, the two leads are perfect and the writing is quick and snappy.

Author: rbrt_gilchrist
Review: This is a fun Friday night at home with your loved one and a bowl of popcorn.

Author: ops-52535
Review: Because this is a good mixture of genre interception, with a whole lot of the new verbal comedy, with a good stroke of blimping good old fashion coincidental kick and run fun, mixed with some coldblooded murders that send shivers through the unlucky couple, and where the black comedy are almost not excisting.

Author: moosh2004
Review:
The endless chatter between the leads is too much
its like they had 40 minutes spare time in the script in order to make it a full movie so they just went on with unnecessary and forced dialogue

Author: RosanaBotafogo
Review: How cute, I fell in love, perfect chemistry between an unlikely couple, all the awkward scenes became extremely funny, and the more bizarre and absurd, the more fun it became... Delicious to watch...

Author: paralleltripper
Review_Title: One of the better rom coms
Review: Really enjoyed this rom com action film. It flowed well with cool twist and silly turns. One of the funnier rom coms for me and not as cringey as some others that put me off. Loved the dress changes too, go unicorn!

Author: Calicodreamin
Review: Some serious laugh out loud moments, the main characters have great chemistry and banter.. The storyline was fairly well developed, though the ending felt a bit unresolved with a few loose ends. But for the most part the jokes landed and the laughs were there. I won't ask for more.

Author: joiningjt
Review_Title: R u kidding? Terrible!! Worst movie this year
Review: Bad all around I've never given a comedy a 1!! This one was bad, the plot was stupid, the lead actors didnt pull it off, their chemistry was non existent, the jokes were bad and seemed like they just said their lines without any comedic form at all!! No emotion, so glad this didnt hit the theater but was released on Netflix because technically it was free.

Author: Edvis-1997
Review: The best part of the movie was song at the ending. This film is way too overrated. It was boring and lame comedy. Compared two films: this one and "The wrong Missy" this film is totally less valuable, the plot is different but as comedy it just sucks,actors were not as good as in "The wrong Missy" but somehow this movie has better rating on imdb, that's just ridiculous.I was thinking to give it 5 but compared films I've seen in 2020 and also seeing it has 6/10imdb I can't give more than 4. In my opinion, this movie is overrated by Indian watchers. I wouldn't recommend to watch this film.

Author: mouldypeach
Review:
I was hopeful, going in to The Lovebirds, because I'd read reviews praising the chemistry and likeability of the leads. That they are likeable is true enough, and there are a couple of jokes in there somewhere too but the plot is weak and, for a short feature film, it dragged like hell. I thought it was about 25 minutes longer than it was.
The best bits are when they couple are just talking about their problems. They could have made a modern Before Sunrise, but instead they made a bellow average murder mystery.
Shame.

Author: Sir_AmirSyarif
Review_Title: Kumail Nanjiani needs to work on his on-screen kisses
Review: Kumail Nanjiani and Issa Rae are both good and have decent chemistry - though Nanjiani seriously needs to work on his on-screen kisses - but the film lets them down with its poor, bland, and lazily-written script. There are few minutes with genuine laughs but, ultimately, 'The Lovebirds' just felt tired by the end of its actually short run.

Author: cruise01
Review_Title: Kind of boring and the leads were not as funny.
Review: The Lovebirds (2 out of 5 stars).

Author: jsetherickson
Review_Title: I can't believe they were going to release this in theatres
Review: The best way to describe this would be two talented actors were give a plot that sounded good in theory but was utterly destroyed by a terrible script and veeeery poor editing.

Author: SnoopyStyle
Review: Leilani (Issa Rae) and Jibran (Kumail Nanjiani) are new lovebirds in New Orleans. Four years later, they're fighting about everything from marriage to The Amazing Race. They agree to break up when suddenly Jibran drives over a bicyclist. It's the start of a ridiculous murder mystery while they go on the run from the cops.

Author: krunalpatel11127
Review:
I just see no chemistry at all especially they look more like friends then couple I mean casting n screenplay direction needed lot of work.
Disappointed with the end result.

Author: julie-130-418956
Review: Not sure what the bad reviews are about, I thought this show was really funny. Issa Rae and Kumail Nanjiani have great chemistry and the banteer was awesome. Worth watching for sure.

Author: joshbarton15
Review_Title: Way too try hard for my liking.
Review: The Lovebirds starts promisingly with its two leads bouncing off each other well however, it soon falls into the trap of being an unfunny comedy that tries way too hard to be funny by making almost every line awkward or weird. The sex club scene was by far the funniest moment and earns half a star by itself but even that is not enough to save this trainwreck. Shame as I really liked The Big Sick.
